title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Master Bedroom and Dining Room Mirrors", 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper center: NOTE!/SEE MR. EDW B KIRKS DRAW. NO. F-3/FOR DETAILS OF LIGHTING FIXTURES
description: Dining room north elevation and Master Bedroom west elevation showing mirrors. At left, large mirror above dining room sideboard; polished chrome reflectors at each side. Elevation at right shows large mirror above mantel; large clock on face of mirror with polished chrome hands and twelve punties for hour markers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Master Bedroom and Dining Room Mirrors", 1937.
1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-631.
